translation.text: Blue Mountains Line, Cumberland Line, Western Line - Delays

Please allow additional travel time due to track equipment repairs at Westmead. Repair crews are on site and are working to rectify the issue. Your service may depart from a different platform than usual and may also have altered stops. Please listen to announcements, check information screens and transport apps for service information.

If you are travelling on the T5 Cumberland Line you may need to change at Granville to complete your journey. 
Customers between Richmond & Blacktown, please change at Blacktown to complete your journey.

*Limited capacity events*
*Attendees travelling by public transport should allow plenty of additional travel time and plan ahead by checking real-time capacity indicators where available as you may need to wait for the next service with available physical distancing capacity*

AFL: Hawthorn v Melbourne - GIANTS Stadium, Sydney Olympic Park
15:30 to 18:35
- Trains run from Lidcombe to Olympic Park every 10 minutes til late.

NRL: Panthers v Cowboys - Panthers Stadium, Penrith
16:00 to 17:45
- The closest station to Panthers Stadium is Penrith on the T1 Western Line. The stadium is approximately a 10 minute walk from the station.

NRL: Warriors v Sharks - Central Coast Stadium, Gosford
14:00 to 16:00
- The closest station to Central Coast Stadium is Gosford on the Central Coast & Newcastle Line. The stadium is a short walk via Showground Road and Dane Drive.

Details: https://transportnsw.info/events/2020/07

Penrith due to track equipment repairs at Westmead. Please allow additional travel time, listen to announcements, check information screens and transport apps for service information as stopping patterns & departure platforms may change at short notice

Wentworthville, Pendle Hill, Toongabbie due to track equipment repairs at Westmead. Please allow additional travel time, listen to announcements, check information screens and transport apps for service information as stopping patterns & departure platforms may change at short notice

Due to track equipment repairs at Westmead. If you are travelling on the T5 Cumberland Line please join a T4 Western Line service to Granville and change there for a T2 Inner West & Leppington Line service travelling away from the City to complete your journey.

Blacktown Due to track equipment repairs at Westmead. If you are travelling on the T5 Cumberland Line please join a T4 Western Line service to Granville and change there for a T2 Inner West & Leppington Line service travelling away from the City to complete your journey.

Until Wednesday 9 September the lift that goes from the concourse to street level will be closed for maintenance. If you require a lift or easy access you may wish to consider using Central as an alternative. If you require further assistance please see station staff or call 8337 8400.
The lift between the concourse and platform 5 is temporarily out of service.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 1/2 is temporarily out of service.  If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9848 9206.
The lift between the concourse and the Princes Highway is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask staff or call 9563 7574.
The lift between the concourse and platform 4 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9563 7273.
The lift between platforms 2/3 and the footbridge is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 4934 4420.
The lift between platform 1 and Railway Pde is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 4223 5576.

From 14 June to 16 August 2020 the lift between the concourse and platforms 1 and 2 is temporarily unavailable due to scheduled upgrade works. If you require a lift or easy access please change at Mount Druitt or Werrington stations to get to your destination. For further assistance, please see station staff or call 9851 7525.

There are changes to the way you access and move around Town Hall Station. Please follow directions of station staff for guidance and ensure you maintain physical distance from others throughout your journey.

There are changes to Platforms 16 and 17 at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works.    Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work has moved from the middle of the platform to the southern end of the platform. Temporary concrete ramps connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete floor surface areas.   For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.    If you are travelling to Central Station and require assistance to alight from Platforms 16 and 17, please board via the front door of the fourth train carriage.   For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works, visit sydneymetro.info.
The Southern Tunnel is currently closed for Sydney Metro works. Please use the Suburban Tunnel for access to Platforms 4 to 23 or travel via the Northern Concourse.

From midnight Saturday 18 July to 4am Monday 20 July 2020 - the stairs, escalators and lift between the Grand Concourse and Northern Concourse at Central Station will be closed for Sydney Metro construction works. The Suburban Tunnel will also be closed during this period.  Alternative stairs, escalators and lift are available outside the Opal gates. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff.  For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works visit sydneymetro.info.

There are changes to Platforms 18 and 19 at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works.   Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work has moved from the middle of the platform to the southern end of the platform.  Temporary concrete ramps connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete surface areas.   For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.   For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works visit sydneymetro.info.

From Wednesday 10 June to Wednesday 9 September the lift that goes from the concourse to street level will be closed for maintenance. If you require a lift or easy access you may wish to consider using Central as an alternative. If you require further assistance please see station staff or call 8337 8400.
All train services travelling away from the City will depart from platform 4 due to track equipment repairs at Westmead.

Due to current upgrading of Mittagong Station, Entry and Exit points to the station have altered.  Entry/exit to Regent street side of station is now at Southern or Moss Vale end of the station building.  Entry/exit to Railway Parade side of the station is now at Southern or Moss Vale end of the Waiting shelter on that platform. Please allow additional time to access the station as a reduced number of parking spaces are available.

From 14 June to 16 August 2020 the lift between the concourse and platforms 1 and 2 is temporarily unavailable due to scheduled upgrade works. If you require a lift or easy access please change at Mount Druitt or Werrington stations to get to your destination. For further assistance, please see station staff or call 9851 7525.

New Metro Platforms are being constructed on platforms 1 & 2 at Sydenham Station. T3 Bankstown Line services to the City operate from platform 3 & T3 Bankstown Line services to Lidcombe and Liverpool operate from platform 4. Platform 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works - A new Metro concourse is also being constructed at the Northern end of the station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please see staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
